Trigger.name: autosnapper
Trigger.script:
-- This autosnapper trigger attempts to delay your snap enough to ensure your next locking dstab lands when impatience hits -- You can set the mySnap variable in lokisettings
if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then local snapdelay = mySnap tempTimer(snapdelay,[[autosnapper()]]) end

Trigger.name: event.snapped
Trigger.script:
--REQUEUE STAB local function requeue_stab() ak.scoreup() expandAlias("ds") end
if mesmer.status == "sealed" then creplace("<orange>[HYP]: snapped <red>"..matches[2].."<orange>!!!") holdbal = true hypstatus = true hyp_delay = true if hldbal then killTimer(hldbal) end if hypsts then killTimer(hypsts) end if delhyp then killTimer(delhyp) end hldbal = tempTimer(2, [[holdbal = false]]) hypsts = tempTimer(3.5, [[hypstatus = false]]) delhyp = tempTimer(6, [[hyp_delay = nil]]) requeue_stab() end

Trigger.name: party.calls.affs
Trigger.script:
local shotcaller = matches[2] local person = matches[3] local aff = matches[4] local aff2 = matches[5] local aff3 = matches[6] local aff4 = matches[7]
if IsTargetted(person) then if aff4 ~= nil then if (aff ~= "paralysis" and aff ~= "impatience") then affstrack.score[string.lower(aff)] = 100 ak.scoreup() end if (aff2 ~= "paralysis" and aff2 ~= "impatience") then affstrack.score[string.lower(aff2)] = 100 ak.scoreup() end if (aff3 ~= "paralysis" and aff3 ~= "impatience") then affstrack.score[string.lower(aff3)] = 100 ak.scoreup() end if (aff4 ~= "paralysis" and aff4 ~= "impatience") then affstrack.score[string.lower(aff4)] = 100 ak.scoreup() end elseif aff3 ~= nil then if (aff ~= "paralysis" and aff ~= "impatience") then affstrack.score[string.lower(aff)] = 100 ak.scoreup() end if (aff2 ~= "paralysis" and aff2 ~= "impatience") then affstrack.score[string.lower(aff2)] = 100 ak.scoreup() end if (aff3 ~= "paralysis" and aff3 ~= "impatience") then affstrack.score[string.lower(aff3)] = 100 ak.scoreup() end elseif aff2 ~= nil then if (aff ~= "paralysis" and aff ~= "impatience") then affstrack.score[string.lower(aff)] = 100 ak.scoreup() end if (aff2 ~= "paralysis" and aff2 ~= "impatience") then affstrack.score[string.lower(aff2)] = 100 ak.scoreup() end elseif (aff ~= "paralysis" and aff ~= "impatience") then affstrack.score[string.lower(aff)] = 100 ak.scoreup() end end

Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end boardaffs = boardaffs or {} weaponattack = weaponattack or {} if #boardaffs > 0 then table.remove(boardaffs, #boardaffs) elseif #weaponattack > 0 then if weaponattack[#weaponattack] == "the thorny vines covering your arms" and affstrack.crushedherb then table.remove(weaponattack, #weaponattack) end table.remove(weaponattack, #weaponattack) end

Trigger.name: Confirmed Hit
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end deleteLine() cecho("<yellow>.") boardaffs = boardaffs or {} hitrelay = {} currentvenoms = currentvenoms or {} weaponattack = weaponattack or {} if #weaponattack > 0 then for i = 1, #weaponattack do currentvenoms[weaponattack[i]] = currentvenoms[weaponattack[i]] or {1} table.insert(hitrelay, affstrack.venoms[currentvenoms[weaponattack[i]][1]]) table.remove(currentvenoms[weaponattack[i]], 1) end end if #boardaffs > 0 then for i = 1, #boardaffs do if boardaffs[i] == "HIGH" then table.insert(hitrelay, ak.SnBSmashHighAff(hitrelay)) else table.insert(hitrelay, boardaffs[i]) end end end --display(hitrelay) weaponattack = nil boardaffs = {} if #hitrelay == 1 then OppGainedAff(hitrelay[1]) elseif #hitrelay > 1 then OppGainedAff(table.concat(hitrelay, " ")) end disableTrigger("Missed Single Removal") --DO NOT CHANGE! disableTrigger("Confirmed Hit") ak.limbs.deleteset = true ak.showPrompt()

Trigger.name: Pressure
Trigger.script:
ak = ak or {} ak.duress = ak.duress or {} ak.duress.pressurescore = affstrack.score.disloyalty + affstrack.score.manaleech + affstrack.score.deadening
if ak.duress.pressurescore < 200 then ak.duress.pressure = ak.duress.pressure + 1 else ak.duress.pressure = ak.duress.pressure + 2 end ak.scoreup(matches[2]) cecho("\n<cyan>Pressure lvl: <yellow>"..ak.duress.pressure)

if target == matches[2] and ak.duress.pressure > 0 then ak.duress.pressure = ak.duress.pressure - 1 cecho("\n<cyan>Pressure lvl: <yellow>"..ak.duress.pressure) ak.scoreup(matches[2]) end

--matches[3] == humor wracked

--matches[3] + matches[3] == humor wracked

^You send ripples throughout the body of ([\w'\-]+), as you wrack (his|her) ([\w'\-]+) humour twice.$

Trigger.name: Temper
Trigger.script: if matches[4] == "sanguine" then ak.alchemist.humour.sanguine = ak.alchemist.humour.sanguine + 1 elseif matches[4] == "phlegmatic" then ak.alchemist.humour.phlegmatic = ak.alchemist.humour.phlegmatic + 1 elseif matches[4] == "choleric" then ak.alchemist.humour.choleric = ak.alchemist.humour.choleric + 1 elseif matches[4] == "melancholic" then ak.alchemist.humour.melancholic = ak.alchemist.humour.melancholic + 1 end

regexCodeList.string: ^You redirect ([\w'\-]+)\'s internal fluids\, tempering ([\w'\-]+) ([\w'\-]+) humour\.$
^Looking over ([\w'\-]+), you see that:

Trigger.name: Tempers
Trigger.script: if matches[3] == "sanguine" then ak.alchemist.humour.sanguine = tonumber(matches[4]) elseif matches[3] == "phlegmatic" then ak.alchemist.humour.phlegmatic = tonumber(matches[4]) elseif matches[3] == "choleric" then ak.alchemist.humour.choleric = tonumber(matches[4]) elseif matches[3] == "melancholic" then ak.alchemist.humour.melancholic = tonumber(matches[4]) end

regexCodeList.string: ^(His|Her) ([\w'\-]+) humour has been tempered a total of (\d+) times.$

Trigger.name: Stat Evals
Trigger.script:
if matches[3] == "health" then ak.currenthealth = tonumber(matches[4]) ak.maxhealth = tonumber(matches[5]) ak.healthpercent = ak.currenthealth / ak.maxhealth * 100 cecho("<green>"..ak.healthpercent.."%") ak.knownmaxhealth[target] = tonumber(matches[5]) elseif matches[3] == "mana" then ak.currentmana = tonumber(matches[4]) ak.maxmana = tonumber(matches[5]) ak.manapercent = ak.currentmana / ak.maxmana * 100 cecho("<blue>"..ak.manapercent.."%") end
if ak.healthpercent <= 60 and ak.manapercent <= 60 then send("queue prepend eqbal aurify " .. target) end

regexCodeList.string: ^(His|Her) (health|mana) is at (\d+) out of (\d+).$

Trigger.name: No Humours
Trigger.script: ak.alchemist.humour.sanguine = 0 ak.alchemist.humour.choleric = 0 ak.alchemist.humour.melancholic = 0 ak.alchemist.humour.phlegmatic = 0

regexCodeList.string: His humours are all at normal levels.
Her humours are all at normal levels.

Trigger.name: Prompt
Trigger.script: ak.scoreup(target)

Trigger.name: Copper
Trigger.script: ak.defs.shield = false ak.scoreup(target)

regexCodeList.string: Drawing upon the latent alchemical energies, you sketch out a symbol in the air with your finger in the shape of two overlapping hexagons.

Trigger.name: HomunGerminated
Trigger.script: wsys.unpause()

regexCodeList.string: The growing nucleus begins taking a humanoid form,

Trigger.name: Phleg
Trigger.script:
local aff = "weariness anorexia slickness lethargy"
if ak.alchemist.humour.phlegmatic < 4 then aff = "lethargy" elseif ak.alchemist.humour.phlegmatic < 6 then aff = "lethargy anorexia" elseif ak.alchemist.humour.phlegmatic < 7 then aff = "lethargy anorexia slickness" end if matches[2] == target then OppGainedAff(aff) end ak.alchemist.humour.phlegmatic = 0

regexCodeList.string: ^You inundate ([\w'\-]+)\'s phlegmatic humour\, and (his|her) eyes grow vacant\.$

Trigger.name: Ate For Humour
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then ak.alchemist.humour.sanguine = ak.alchemist.humour.sanguine - 1 ak.alchemist.humour.choleric = ak.alchemist.humour.choleric - 1 ak.alchemist.humour.melancholic = ak.alchemist.humour.melancholic - 1 ak.alchemist.humour.phlegmatic = ak.alchemist.humour.phlegmatic - 1 end if ak.alchemist.humour.sanguine < 0 then ak.alchemist.humour.sanguine = 0 end if ak.alchemist.humour.choleric < 0 then ak.alchemist.humour.choleric = 0 end if ak.alchemist.humour.melancholic < 0 then ak.alchemist.humour.melancholic = 0 end if ak.alchemist.humour.phlegmatic < 0 then ak.alchemist.humour.phlegmatic = 0 end ak.scoreup(matches[2])

regexCodeList.string: ^([\w'\-]+) eats a ginger root\.$
^([\w'\-]+) eats an antimony flake\.$

Trigger.name: Corruption
Trigger.script: if target == matches[2] then OppGainedAff("corruption") corrtimer = tempTimer(45, [[OppLostAff("corruption")]]) end

regexCodeList.string: ^Channeling your focus through your link to your homunculus, you reach out to find the ethereal hook for (\w+)'s humours.

Trigger.name: Corruption cured
Trigger.script: if target == matches[2] then OppLostAff("corruption") end

regexCodeList.string: ^(\w+) looks far healthier all of a sudden\.$

Trigger.name: Stared
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end if nextcurse then if nextcurse == "breach" then elseif nextcurse == "sicken" then if affstrack.score.paralysis < 100 then nextcurse = "paralysis" elseif affstrack.score.healthleech < 100 then nextcurse = "manaleech" else nextcurse = "slickness" end elseif nextcurse == "plague" then nextcurse = "voyria" elseif nextcurse == "clumsy" then nextcurse = "clumsiness" elseif nextcurse == "dizzy" then nextcurse = "dizziness" elseif nextcurse == "stupid" then nextcurse = "stupidity" elseif nextcurse == "vomiting" then nextcurse = "nausea" elseif nextcurse == "reckless" then nextcurse = "recklessness" end OppGainedAff(nextcurse) nextcurse = nil return end if nextcurse2 then if nextcurse2 == "breach" then elseif nextcurse2 == "sicken" then if affstrack.score.paralysis < 100 then nextcurse2 = "paralysis" elseif affstrack.score.healthleech < 100 then nextcurse2 = "manaleech" else nextcurse2 = "slickness" end elseif nextcurse2 == "plague" then nextcurse2 = "voyria" elseif nextcurse2 == "clumsy" then nextcurse2 = "clumsiness" elseif nextcurse2 == "dizzy" then nextcurse2 = "dizziness" elseif nextcurse2 == "stupid" then nextcurse2 = "stupidity" elseif nextcurse2 == "vomiting" then nextcurse2 = "nausea" elseif nextcurse2 == "reckless" then nextcurse2 = "recklessness" end OppGainedAff(nextcurse2) nextcurse2 = nil end

regexCodeList.string: You stare at ([\w'\-]+), giving [\w'\-]+ the evil eye\.$

Trigger.name: Sicken
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then if affstrack.score.paralysis ~= 100 then ak.ProTrackingConfirmed("paralysis") affstrack.score.paralysis = 100 affstrack.score.slickness = 100 affstrack.score.manaleech = 100 ak.scoreup(matches[2]) else affstrack.score.paralysis = 100 affstrack.score.slickness = 100 affstrack.score.manaleech = 100 ak.scoreup(matches[2]) end end

regexCodeList.string: ^([\w'\-]+) doubles over\, eyes bulging\.$

TriggerGroup.name: Bard Group
TriggerGroup.script:
-- --Everything that follows was originally written by Klendathu
--I have mildly modified portions of be more up to date with my current offense tracking system, --while attempting to leave the majority of it in place so he has to do very little to maintain --continued functionality. If you are a using this section, I strongly encourage you to make sure --to spend a few extra seconds and drop him a thank you.
--Thank you.

Trigger.name: Pesante fired
Trigger.script: tunesmithing = "none" if affstrack.score.deaf < 100 then affstrack.score.deaf = 100 ak.scoreup(target) end

regexCodeList.string: The songblessing unleashes a stunning percussive blast.
The songblessing unleashes a strident note.

Trigger.name: Check tunesmithing
Trigger.script: tunesmithing = multimatches[2][2]

regexCodeList.string: A soft, haunting melody emanates from this blade.
^It has been tunesmithed with the power of the ([\w'\-]+)\.
It weighs about 10 pounds.

Trigger.name: Tunesmithing
Trigger.script: tunesmithing = matches[2]

regexCodeList.string: ^You weave strands of melodies over your blade, tunesmithing it with the power of the ([\w'\-]+)\.$

Trigger.name: Martellato fired
Trigger.script: tunesmithing = "none"

regexCodeList.string: The songblessing upon the rapier swells with a rich, vibrant hum.

Trigger.name: Acciaccatura fired
Trigger.script: tunesmithing = "none" if ak.ai() then return end --ak.limbs.ParseonLine() if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then local smashlimb = ak.limbs.standardizeLimb(matches[3]) if affstrack.score[smashlimb] < 100 then OppGainedAff(smashlimb) end end

regexCodeList.string: ^A bell\-like tone rings out from your songblessed rapier\, echoed by the sound of cracking bone as ([\w'\-]+)\'s (left leg|right leg|left arm|right arm) snaps\.$

Trigger.script:
if matches[2] == "yourself" then return false end
if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then affstrack.score.deaf = 100 end

regexCodeList.string: ^You lightly strike the side of ([\w'\-]+)\'s head with your rapier\.$

Trigger.name: Raze rebounding/shield
Trigger.script: if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then if string.find(matches[1], "rebounding") then ak.defs.rebounding = false else ak.defs.shield = false end ak.scoreup(matches[2]) end

regexCodeList.string: ^You raze ([\w'\-]+)\'s (aura of rebounding|magical shield) with a rapier carved from living ice\.$

Trigger.script: if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then OppGainedAff("deaf") end

regexCodeList.string: ^([\w'\-]+) drifts away into the soft music of the Berceuse\, abandoning (him|her)self to its soporific tones\.$

Trigger.name: Berceuse sent them to sleep!
Trigger.script: if multimatches[1][2]:lower() == target:lower() then if affstrack.score.prone < 100 then OppGainedAff("prone sleep") else OppGainedAff("sleep") end end

regexCodeList.string: ^([\w'\-]+)\'s eyes close suddenly as (s|)he falls asleep\.$
^([\w'\-]+) drifts away into the soft music of the Berceuse\, abandoning (him|her)self to its soporific tones\.$

Trigger.script: ak.songoff = true if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then if affstrack.score.clumsiness == 100 then OppGainedAff("Dizziness") else OppGainedAff("Clumsiness") end else ak.scoreup(matches[2]) end

regexCodeList.string: ^You sing a graceful maqam of el\'Jazira at ([\w'\-]+)\.$
^The songbird upon your shoulder sings a graceful maqam of el\'Jazira at ([\w'\-]+)\.$

^The songbird upon your shoulder launches into a droning song\, subjecting ([\w'\-]+) to a lengthy isorhythm\.$

Trigger.script: ak.songoff = true if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then OppGainedAff("Paranoia") else ak.scoreup(matches[2]) end

regexCodeList.string: ^With a mournful cry you begin the requiem for Seleucar to ([\w'\-]+)\.$
^With a mournful cry\, the songbird upon your shoulder begins the requiem for Seleucar to ([\w'\-]+)\.$

^The songbird upon your shoulder begins to perfectly mimic the recitation of an epic tale of the heroism of Nicator to ([\w'\-]+)\, holding (him|her) spellbound\.$

Trigger.name: Cantata (breaks shield)

ak.songoff = true selectCurrentLine() fg("GreenYellow") deselect() resetFormat()
if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then ak.defs.rebounding = false ak.defs.shield = false ak.scoreup(matches[2]) end

regexCodeList.string: ^Your cantata shatters the defences surrounding ([\w'\-]+)\.$
^Your cantata shatters the magical shield surrounding (.+)\.$

Trigger.name: Dwinnu (breaks bonds)

regexCodeList.string: 'DWINNU! DWINNU!' you chant urgently as your bonds turn to dust.

Trigger.name: Voicecraft failed due to deafness
Trigger.script: ak.songoff = true cecho("\n <white>--== TARGET IS DEAF ==--<reset>") if not matches[2] or IsTargetted(matches[2]) then affstrack.score.deaf = 0 ak.scoreup(matches[2]) end

regexCodeList.string: ^You sing a graceful maqam of el\'Jazira at ([\w'\-]+)\, who seems unmoved\.$
^You sense futility as you recite an obscure Kamleikan haiku to ([\w'\-]+)\.$
^In droning song you subject ([\w'\-]+) to a lengthy isorhythm\, without results\.$
^Weaving a complex counterpoint between instrument and voice\, you fail to instill anything like fear in ([\w'\-]+)\.$
^You invoke chaotic powers in a dark solo but fail to drain the essential magic of ([\w'\-]+)\.$
^You direct a poem of gluttony and decay at ([\w'\-]+)\, without success\.$
^You sing a pastorale of the fields and streams to ([\w'\-]+)\, who seems not to notice\.$
^You chant \'GIMMEGIMME\' at ([\w'\-]+)\, who does not react\.$
^You sing an irritating\, mind\-numbing ditty at ([\w'\-]+)\, who seems curiously unaffected\.$
^With a mournful cry you begin the requiem for Seleucar to ([\w'\-]+)\, who appears unmoved\.$
^Using a heavy tremolo you sing\, uselessly\, aiming at ([\w'\-]+)\'s (left|right) leg\.$
^With a frustratingly irrelevant vibrato you aim at ([\w'\-]+)\'s (left|right) arm\.$
^Your recitation of an epic tale of the heroism of Nicator has no effect on ([\w'\-]+)\.$
^With a wink\, you recite \"Ode to Elixirs\" to ([\w'\-]+)\, who looks on\, unimpressed\.$
^Starting with the characteristic Jaziran trill\, you sing a qasida of asceticism to ([\w'\-]+)\, who seems undaunted\.$
^With a gravity born of respect\, you sing of the saintly Imithia\, if only for yourself\.$
^Composing a few clever lines in your head\, you quickly sing a jaunty limerick at ([\w'\-]+)\, who seems to pay no notice\.$
^You sing a sonorous chant which fails to strip the defences of ([\w'\-]+)\.$

Trigger.name: Cantata no shield / rebounding
Trigger.script: ak.songoff = true if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then ak.defs.rebounding = false ak.defs.shield = false ak.scoreup(matches[2]) end

regexCodeList.string: ^You let the grace of your voice shine forth with a Scarlattan cantata at (.+)\.$

Trigger.name: Dirge (banish gravehands)
Trigger.script: ak.songoff = true selectCurrentLine() fg("GreenYellow") deselect() resetFormat()

regexCodeList.string: With an unearthly dirge, you banish the hands that reach from the grave.

Trigger.name: Balance Recovered
Trigger.script: ak.songoff = false ak.scoreup(target)

regexCodeList.string: You have recovered voice balance.

Trigger.name: Tremolo
Trigger.script: ak.limbs.ScoreRun = true ak.limbs.LimbHit(multimatches[2][2],"Me", "tremolo", multimatches[2][3].."leg")

regexCodeList.string: Using a heavy tremolo you brutally punish
^Using a heavy tremolo you brutally punish ([\w'\-]+)\'s already shattered ([\w'\-]+) leg\.$

Trigger.name: Martellato
Trigger.script: OppGainedAff("Prone")

regexCodeList.string: The songblessing upon the rapier swells with a rich, vibrant hum.

Trigger.name: Hearts-Fury Counter
Trigger.script: enableTrigger("Confirmed Counter Hit")

regexCodeList.string: Full of controlled rage you lash out in a counterstrike.

Trigger.name: Riposte Parry
Trigger.script: enableTrigger("Confirmed Counter Hit")

regexCodeList.string: Lightning-quick, you flick your blade out in riposte.

Trigger.name: Confirmed Counter Hit
Trigger.script: disableTrigger("Confirmed Counter Hit") if target == matches[3] then enableTrigger("Missed Single Removal") --DO NOT CHANGE! enableTrigger("Confirmed Hit") --DO NOT CHANGE! if weaponattack == nil then weaponattack = {} end table.insert(weaponattack, matches[2]) end --display(weaponattack)

regexCodeList.string: ^You bring (.*) crashing down on ([\w'\-]+)\.$

Trigger.name: Shoulder
Trigger.script: if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then OppGainedAff("weariness") end

regexCodeList.string: ^With a fluid motion, you aim a blow just below ([\w'\-]+)'s shoulder.$
^Lunging forward with practised grace, you strike at the back of ([\w'\-]+)'s (right|left) hand.$

Trigger.name: Ears
Trigger.script: if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then OppGainedAff("clumsiness") end

regexCodeList.string: ^Lashing out with open palms, you box ([\w'\-]+)\'s ears.$

Trigger.name: Nose
Trigger.script: if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then OppGainedAff("disloyalty") end

regexCodeList.string: ^With the heel of your palm\, you send a pulverising blow at ([\w'\-]+)\'s nose.$

Trigger.name: Hit 3
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then pullray = {} if matches[3] then table.insert(pullray, matches[3]) end if matches[4] then table.insert(pullray, matches[4]) end if matches[5] then table.insert(pullray, matches[5]) end if table.contains(pullray,"orange") then OppGainedAff("paralysis") end if table.contains(pullray,"violet") then OppGainedAff("aeon") end if table.contains(pullray,"indigo") then OppGainedAff("stupidity") end end

Trigger.name: Hit 2
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then pullray = {} if matches[3] then table.insert(pullray, matches[3]) end if matches[4] then table.insert(pullray, matches[4]) end if matches[5] then table.insert(pullray, matches[5]) end if table.contains(pullray,"orange") then OppGainedAff("paralysis") end if table.contains(pullray,"violet") then OppGainedAff("aeon") end if table.contains(pullray,"indigo") then OppGainedAff("stupidity") end end

Trigger.name: Instill
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then if matches[3] ~= "an allergy to sunlight" then OppGainedAff(matches[3]) else OppGainedAff("darkshade") end end

Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then OppGainedAff("disloyalty shyness") end

regexCodeList.string: ^You utter a terrible curse and point a finger at ([\w'\-]+)\.$

Trigger.name: Shrivel
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then smashlimb = matches[3]..matches[4] if affstrack.score[smashlimb] < 100 then OppGainedAff(smashlimb) end end

Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end if string.match(matches[2],target) then OppGainedAff("enlighten") end

Trigger.name: Whisperingmadness got
Trigger.script:
if ak.ai() then return end
if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then if affstrack.whisperscore < 1 then for i=1, #affstrack.whisperlist do if affstrack.score[affstrack.whisperlist[i]] > 0 then if ak.ProTrackingConfirmed then ak.ProTrackingConfirmed(affstrack.whisperlist[i]) OppGainedAff("whisperingmadness") return else affstrack.score[affstrack.whisperlist[i]] = 100 OppGainedAff("whisperingmadness") return end end end end OppGainedAff("whisperingmadness") end

regexCodeList.string: ^You pass your hand in front of ([\w'\-]+). ([\w'\-]+) trembles and h(is|er) eyes widen in terror.$

Trigger.name: Whisperingmadness Confirm
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end if ak.ProTrackingConfirmed then ak.ProTrackingConfirmed("whisperingmadness") else affstrack.score.whisperingmadness = 100 ak.scoreup(matches[2]) end

regexCodeList.string: ^([\w'\-]+) trembles and [\w'\-]+ eyes widen in terror\. (She|He) looks around (herself|himself) as if searching for something that isn\'t there\.$

Trigger.name: Whisper Focused
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end local aff = matches[3] OppGainedAff(aff)

regexCodeList.string: ^You sense that (\w+) has been struck down with (\w+)\.$

Trigger.name: WhisperFail
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then for i=1, #affstrack.whisperlist do if affstrack.score[affstrack.whisperlist[i]] > 0 then if ak.thoughtIhad then ak.thoughtIhad(affstrack.whisperlist[i]) return end end end end

regexCodeList.string: ^You pass your hand in front of (\w+)\. \w+ shakes \w+ head as if clearing \w+ mind\.$

Trigger.name: Read Aura
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end affstrack.score.blind = 100 affstrack.score.deaf = 100 ak.defs.rebounding = false ak.defs.speed = false ak.mounted = false enableTrigger("Finale Read Aura") enableTrigger("Readaura Defs") disableTrigger("Lifegiver (def)") disableTrigger("Wsys Tattoos") ak.deleteFull()

regexCodeList.string: ^Studying the aura of ([\w'\-]+)\, you look for traces of anything that may be protecting it\.$

Trigger.name: Finale Read Aura
Trigger.script: disableTrigger("Finale Read Aura") disableTrigger("Readaura Defs") enableTrigger("Wsys Tattoos") enableTrigger("Lifegiver (def)") cecho("<yellow>[<white>"..ak.occie.aura.physical.."|<cyan>"..ak.occie.aura.mental.."<yellow>]") ak.occie.aura.physical = matches[3] + 0 ak.occie.aura.mental = matches[4] + 0 ak.scoreup(matches[2]) if (not ak.defs.speed) then cecho("\n-- <red>-<white>SPEED<red>-<white>SPEED<red>") end

Trigger.name: Curse Add
Trigger.script:
if ak.ai() then return end if not IsTargetted(multimatches[2][2]) then return end ak.bleedincrease = 40 --curse local curse = multimatches[2][3] if curse then curse = curse:lower() if curse ~= "breach" and curse ~= "tzantza" and curse ~= "inflame" then if affstrack.score[curse] then OppGainedAff(curse) elseif curse == "peace" then curse = "pacifism" OppGainedAff(curse) elseif curse == "paralyse" then curse = "paralysis" OppGainedAff(curse) elseif curse == "plague" then curse = "voyria" OppGainedAff(curse) elseif curse == "clumsy" then curse = "clumsiness" OppGainedAff(curse) elseif curse == "dizzy" then curse = "dizziness" OppGainedAff(curse) elseif curse == "stupid" then curse = "stupidity" OppGainedAff(curse) elseif curse == "vomiting" then curse = "nausea" OppGainedAff(curse) elseif curse == "reckless" then curse = "recklessness" OppGainedAff(curse) elseif curse == "fear" then ak.tumbling = false ak.scoreup(multimatches[2][2]) elseif curse == "bleed" then
else cecho("Unknown Curse <cyan>"..curse) end end end if ak.shaman and ak.shaman.pararedo and ak.shaman.pararedo == "init" then ak.shaman.pararedo = true elseif ak.shaman and ak.shaman.pararedo then ak.shaman.pararedo = false end

regexCodeList.string: You point an imperious finger at
^You point an imperious finger at ([\w'\-]+)\, bringing the curse of ([\w'\-]+) down upon [\w'\-]+\.$

Trigger.name: Jinx Gone
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end ak.shaman.jinx = false ak.scoreup(target)

regexCodeList.string: You have not built up enough malign power to unleash a jinx.
Your malign power dissipates back to normal levels.

Trigger.name: Jinx Charged
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end ak.shaman.jinx = true ak.scoreup(target)

regexCodeList.string: Your malign power may be unleashed in the form of a jinx against your victim.

Trigger.name: Jinx
Trigger.script:
if ak.ai() then return end local conversion = { ["paralyse"] = "paralysis", ["plague"] = "voyria", ["clumsy"] = "clumsiness", ["dizzy"] = "dizziness", ["stupid"] = "stupidity", ["vomiting"] = "nausea", ["reckless"] = "recklessness", ["nausea"] = "nausea",
} ak.bleedincrease = 80 local setter = "" ak.shaman.jinx = false ak.jinxcount = ak.jinxcount - 1 if matches[2] ~= "breach" and matches[2] ~= "tzantza" then if table.contains(conversion,matches[2]) then setter = setter.." "..conversion[matches[2]] else setter = setter.." "..matches[2] end end if matches[3] ~= "breach" and matches[3] ~= "tzantza" then if table.contains(conversion,matches[3]) then setter = setter.." "..conversion[matches[3]] else setter = setter.." "..matches[3] end end if matches[2] == "tzantza" or matches[3] == "tzantza" then ak.tzantzajinxed = true end OppGainedAff(setter)

regexCodeList.string: ^Summoning your malign power, you direct a twin assault of the curses ([\w'\-]+) and ([\w'\-]+) at ([\w'\-]+)\.$

Trigger.name: No affliction
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then local nohave = matches[3] if nohave == "paralyse" then nohave = "paralysis" end if nohave == "plague" then nohave = "voyria" end if nohave == "clumsy" then nohave = "clumsiness" end if nohave == "dizzy" then nohave = "dizziness" end if nohave == "stupid" then nohave = "stupidity" end if ak.thoughtIhad then ak.thoughtIhad(nohave) else affstrack.score[nohave] = 0 end end

regexCodeList.string: ([\w'\-]+) does not suffer from ([\w'\-]+) \- you may not relapse it.

Trigger.name: Coagulation
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end cecho("\n<dodger_blue>Coagulated!") ak.shaman.coagulation = false ak.bleeding = ak.bleeding - 140 if ak.bleeding < 0 then ak.bleeding = 0 end if invoked~= nil then OppGainedAff(invoked) end

regexCodeList.string: ^With methodical ruthlessness you cast your hand at [\w'\-]+, a wash of cold causing [\w'\-]+ blood to evolve

Trigger.name: Bloodlet
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end cecho("\n<medium_violet_red>Bloodlet!") ak.shaman.bloodlet = false if affstrack.score.haemophilia > 0 then ak.bleeding = ak.bleeding + ak.bloodletbleed() echo(ak.bleeding) end OppGainedAff("haemophilia") ak.dontremovehaemo = true

regexCodeList.string: ^Lacerations appear upon ([\w'\-]+) form, as if slashed by an invisible blade\.$

Trigger.name: Relapse CD
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end ak.shaman.relapse = true ak.scoreup(target)

regexCodeList.string: ^You may utilise spiritual energy to relapse afflictions once again\.$
^A sinister sensation washes over you for the briefest instant, but quickly fades into little more

Trigger.name: Bloodlet CD
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end ak.shaman.bloodlet = true ak.scoreup(target)

regexCodeList.string: ^You may let your victim's blood once again\.$
The realisation that none can match you with the blade suddenly dawns upon you.

Trigger.name: Coagulate CD
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end ak.shaman.coagulation = true ak.scoreup(target)

regexCodeList.string: You may channel spiritual energy to cause a coagulation once again.
A clinical, ruthless presence overcomes you for an instant, before you reassert control.

Trigger.name: Bloodlet used
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end ak.shaman.bloodlet = false ak.scoreup(target)

regexCodeList.string: ^You may not let the blood of your victim again so soon\.$

Trigger.name: Relapse used
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end ak.shaman.relapse = false ak.scoreup(target)

regexCodeList.string: ^You may not yet channel spiritual energy to cause a relapse again\.$

Trigger.name: Jinx Gone
Trigger.script: ak.jinxcount = ak.jinxcount - 1 if ak.jinxcount < 0 then ak.jinxcount = 0 end ak.scoreup(target)

regexCodeList.string: You have not built up enough malign power to unleash a jinx.
Your malign power dissipates back to normal levels.

Trigger.name: Jinx Charged
Trigger.script: ak.jinxcount = ak.jinxcount + 1 ak.scoreup(target)

regexCodeList.string: Your malign power may be unleashed in the form of a jinx against your victim.
^[\w'\-]+ writhes in agony as steam begins rising from [\w'\-]+ skin\.$

Trigger.name: Relapsing
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end cecho("<LawnGreen>\nRelapsed!") ak.shaman.relapse = false ak.shaman.Relapseaff = matches[2] local currentrelapse = matches[2] if ak.ProTrackingConfirmed then ak.ProTrackingConfirmed(currentrelapse) end

regexCodeList.string: ^You manipulate the ([\w'\-]+) affliction affecting ([\w'\-]+), altering it to relapse at a later time.$

Trigger.name: Relapsed
Trigger.script: ak.shaman.Relapseaff = "none" OppGainedAff(matches[3])

regexCodeList.string: ^You sense the insidious power of Syvis strike down ([\w'\-]+) with ([\w'\-]+)\.$

Trigger.name: Arius
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end ak.limbs.ParseonLine() if IsTargetted(matches[2]) and affstrack.score.deaf == 100 then EchoForMajorAff("PRONE") OppGainedAff("prone disrupt") end

regexCodeList.string: ^A terrible cold fills your chest\, constricting your lungs\. Your mouth falls open and an unearthly\, terrible roar emanates forth at ([\w'\-]+)\.$

TriggerGroup.name: Sword & Board Group
TriggerGroup.script:
-- --Everything that follows was originally written by Klendathu
--I have mildly modified portions of be more up to date with my current offense tracking system, --while attempting to leave the majority of it in place so he has to do very little to maintain --continued functionality. If you are a using this section, I strongly encourage you to make sure --to spend a few extra seconds and drop him a thank you.
--Thank you.

Trigger.name: Trip
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end boardaffs = boardaffs or {} local aff = "prone" if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then table.insert(boardaffs, aff) end enableTrigger("Missed Single Removal") --DO NOT CHANGE! enableTrigger("Confirmed Hit") --DO NOT CHANGE!

regexCodeList.string: ^You duck low and smash your shield into the knees of ([\w'\-]+), causing them to buckle underneath (him|her)\.$

Trigger.name: Drive
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end boardaffs = boardaffs or {} local aff = "asthma" if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then table.insert(boardaffs, aff) end enableTrigger("Missed Single Removal") --DO NOT CHANGE! enableTrigger("Confirmed Hit") --DO NOT CHANGE!

regexCodeList.string: ^Planting your feet\, you drive the edge of your shield with vicious precision into the throat of ([\w'\-]+)\.$

Trigger.name: Smash Low
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end boardaffs = boardaffs or {} local aff = "clumsiness" if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then table.insert(boardaffs, aff) end enableTrigger("Missed Single Removal") --DO NOT CHANGE! enableTrigger("Confirmed Hit") --DO NOT CHANGE!

regexCodeList.string: ^You smash the edge of .* into the kneecaps of ([\w'\-]+), causing (him|her) to stumble\.$

Trigger.name: Smash Mid
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end boardaffs = boardaffs or {} local aff = "paralysis" if IsTargetted(matches[2])then table.insert(boardaffs, aff) end enableTrigger("Missed Single Removal") --DO NOT CHANGE! enableTrigger("Confirmed Hit") --DO NOT CHANGE!

regexCodeList.string: ^You quickly lunge to the side\, bringing your shield around to smash into the spine of ([\w'\-]+)\.$

Trigger.name: Smash High (In Progress{Please Submit if You Complete}]
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end boardaffs = boardaffs or {} if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then table.insert(boardaffs, "HIGH") end enableTrigger("Missed Single Removal") --DO NOT CHANGE! enableTrigger("Confirmed Hit") --DO NOT CHANGE!

regexCodeList.string: ^You swing your shield around\, smashing the temple of ([\w'\-]+) with a backhanded blow\.$

Trigger.name: Strike Low
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end affstrack.ferocity = 0

regexCodeList.string: ^You lunge downward, slamming the edge of .+ into the shins of ([\w'\-]+)\.

Trigger.name: Strike Mid
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end boardaffs = boardaffs or {} local aff = "sensitivity" affstrack.ferocity = 0 if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then table.insert(boardaffs, aff) end enableTrigger("Missed Single Removal") --DO NOT CHANGE! enableTrigger("Confirmed Hit") --DO NOT CHANGE!

regexCodeList.string: ^You draw .* back\, then lunge forward with a savage strike to the ribs of ([\w'\-]+)\.$

Trigger.name: Strike High
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end affstrack.ferocity = 0

regexCodeList.string: ^You spin in a quick circle\, using the momentum to savagely strike the chin of ([\w'\-]+) with the edge of .*\.$

Trigger.name: Ferocity 1
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end affstrack.ferocity = 1

regexCodeList.string: You batter at your enemy's defences, seeking an opening.

Trigger.name: Ferocity 2
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end affstrack.ferocity = 2

regexCodeList.string: The strength of your blows continues to rise as you hammer at your enemy.

Trigger.name: Ferocity 3
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end affstrack.ferocity = 3

regexCodeList.string: The ferocity of battle drives you to yet greater heights.

Trigger.name: Ferocity 4
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end affstrack.ferocity = 4

regexCodeList.string: The ferocity of your blows renders any defence useless against you.

Trigger.name: Ferocity Decay 1
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end affstrack.ferocity = affstrack.ferocity or 0 affstrack.ferocity = affstrack.ferocity - 1 if affstrack.ferocity < 0 then affstrack.ferocity = 0 end ak.scoreup(target)

regexCodeList.string: Your ferocity decreases.

Trigger.name: Ferocity Decay All
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end affstrack.ferocity = 0 ak.scoreup(target)

regexCodeList.string: You have lost all of your gained ferocity.
Your attacks lack sufficient ferocity to carry out such an attack.

Trigger.name: Static (paralysis)
Trigger.script: if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then OppGainedAff("paralysis") end

regexCodeList.string: ^Channeling arcane power through your air and earth channels, you summon forth a burst of arcane static directed at ([\w'\-]+).$

Trigger.name: Thunderclap (sensitivity)
Trigger.script: local aff = "sensitivity" if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then OppGainedAff(aff) if affstrack.overcharge == true then OppGainedAff("paralysis") end end

regexCodeList.string: ^Channeling large quantities of arcane power through your air channel, you direct a localised explosion of pure sound at ([\w'\-]+)

Trigger.name: Flash (unblind)
Trigger.script: if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then OppGainedAff("blind") end

regexCodeList.string: ^Summoning forth power through your air and earth channels, you conjure forth a brilliant flash of light at ([\w'\-]+), who blinks rapidly.$

Trigger.name: Flash (transfix)
Trigger.script: if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then OppGainedAff("transfixed") end

regexCodeList.string: ^Summoning forth power through your air and earth channels, you conjure forth a brilliant flash of light at ([\w'\-]+), who freezes in place.$

Trigger.name: Razorwind (healthleech)
Trigger.script: if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then OppGainedAff("healthleech") if affstrack.overcharge == true then OppGainedAff("asthma") end end

regexCodeList.string: ^Tapping into your air channel, you summon forth a vicious wind to lacerate the body of ([\w'\-]+).$

Trigger.name: Cyclone (dizziness)
Trigger.script: if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then OppGainedAff("dizziness") if affstrack.overcharge == true then OppGainedAff("asthma") end end

regexCodeList.string: ^Summoning forth energy that you have gathered, you conjure forth a terrible cyclone of wind, picking up ([\w'\-]+) and whipping (her|him) about in a frenzy.

Trigger.name: Cyclone (impatience)
Trigger.script: if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then affstrack.score.dizziness = 100 OppGainedAff("impatience") if affstrack.overcharge == true then OppGainedAff("asthma") end end

regexCodeList.string: ^Summoning forth energy that you have gathered, you conjure forth a terrible cyclone of wind, picking up the disorientated form of ([\w'\-]+) and whipping (her|him) about in a frenzy, dashing (her|him) against any available surfaces.$

Trigger.name: Hailstone (clumsiness)
Trigger.script: if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then OppGainedAff("clumsiness") if affstrack.overcharge == true then OppGainedAff("weariness") end end

regexCodeList.string: ^([\w'\-]+) stumbles clumsily as the blow lands.$

Trigger.name: Hailstone (epilepsy)
Trigger.script: if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then if affstrack.score.clumsiness < 100 and affstrack.score.clumsiness > 0 then if ak.ProTrackingConfirmed then ak.ProTrackingConfirmed("clumsiness") else affstrack.score.clumsiness = 100 ak.scoreup(matches[2]) end end affstrack.score.clumsiness = 100 OppGainedAff("epilepsy") if affstrack.overcharge == true then OppGainedAff("weariness") end end

regexCodeList.string: ^([\w'\-]+) begins to shake uncontrollably.$

Trigger.name: Hailstone (imaptience)
Trigger.script: if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then if affstrack.score.clumsiness < 100 and affstrack.score.clumsiness > 0 then if ak.ProTrackingConfirmed then ak.ProTrackingConfirmed("clumsiness") else affstrack.score.clumsiness = 100 ak.scoreup(matches[2]) end elseif affstrack.score.epilepsy < 100 and affstrack.score.epilepsy > 0 then if ak.ProTrackingConfirmed then ak.ProTrackingConfirmed("epilepsy") else affstrack.score.epilepsy = 100 ak.scoreup(matches[2]) end end OppGainedAff("impatience") if affstrack.overcharge == true then OppGainedAff("weariness") end end

regexCodeList.string: ^A puzzled expression crosses the face of ([\w'\-]+).$

Trigger.name: Shear (break shield)
Trigger.script: if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then ak.defs.shield = false end ak.scoreup(matches[2])

regexCodeList.string: ^You summon a blade of condensed air and shear cleanly through the protective shield surrounding (.*).$
^You summon a blade of wind to shear at the magical shield of (.*), but find no such barrier.$

Trigger.name: Bolt (blackout)
Trigger.script: if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then OppGainedAff("blackout") tempTimer(4,[[affstrack.score.blackout = 0;ak.scoreup(]]..matches[2]..[[)]]) if affstrack.overcharge == true then OppGainedAff("paralysis") end end

regexCodeList.string: ^Raising your hands above your head, you channel power through your earth and air channels. Focusing upon (.*), you direct your arcane might in a focused burst, bringing down lightning to smite (him|her)\.$

Trigger.name: Sylvan Rend Venoms
Trigger.script: enableTrigger("Missed Single Removal") --DO NOT CHANGE! enableTrigger("Confirmed Hit") --DO NOT CHANGE! weaponattack = weaponattack or {} if matches[2] == "claws" then table.insert(weaponattack, "your wickedly sharp claws") elseif matches[2] == "vines" then table.insert(weaponattack, "the thorny vines covering your arms") else table.insert(weaponattack, matches[2]) end if affstrack.crushedherb then currentvenoms = currentvenoms or {} currentvenoms["the thorny vines covering your arms"] = currentvenoms["the thorny vines covering your arms"] or {} table.insert(currentvenoms["the thorny vines covering your arms"], affstrack.crushedherb) table.insert(weaponattack, "the thorny vines covering your arms") end --display(weaponattack)

regexCodeList.string: ^You command the razor-edged thorny ([\w'\-]+) around you to lash out and rend the (right leg|left leg|right arm|left arm|head|torso) of .*\.$

Trigger.name: Not overcharged
Trigger.script: disableTrigger("Not overcharged")

regexCodeList.string: ^Channeling arcane power through your air and earth channels, you summon forth a burst of arcane static directed at ([\w'\-]+).$
^Channeling large quantities of arcane power through your air channel, you direct a localised explosion of pure sound at ([\w'\-]+).$
^Summoning forth power through your air and earth channels, you conjure forth a brilliant flash of light at ([\w'\-]+), who blinks rapidly.$
^Summoning forth power through your air and earth channels, you conjure forth a brilliant flash of light at ([\w'\-]+), who freezes in place.$
^Tapping into your air channel, you summon forth a vicious wind to lacerate the body of ([\w'\-]+).$
^Summoning forth energy that you have gathered, you conjure forth a terrible cyclone of wind, picking up ([\w'\-]+) and whipping (her|him) about in a frenzy.$

^Summoning forth energy that you have gathered, you conjure forth a terrible cyclone of wind, picking up the disorientated form of ([\w'\-]+) and whipping (her|him) about in a frenzy, dashing (her|him) against any available surfaces.$
^([\w'\-]+) stumbles clumsily as the blow lands.$
^([\w'\-]+) begins to shake uncontrollably.$
^A puzzled expression crosses the face of ([\w'\-]+).$

Trigger.name: Overcharged
Trigger.script: OppGainedAff("clumsiness")

regexCodeList.string: ^You have (.*) units of arcane energy stored.$

Trigger.name: Crushed Pots
Trigger.script: affstrack.crushedherb = affstrack.crushedpots[matches[2]]

regexCodeList.string: Crushing a (.*) in your hand, you absorb the remnants of natural energy stored within.

Trigger.name: Vine Wreathe Enabled
Trigger.script: if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then affstrack.vinewreathe = true end --display(matches[2])

regexCodeList.string: ^Uttering a quiet recitation, you gesture towards ([\w'\-]+). A mass of writhing vines burst forth from the ground, grabbing hold of (his|her) form\.$

Trigger.name: Vine Wreathe Disabled
Trigger.script: if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then affstrack.vinewreathe = false end

regexCodeList.string: ^The vines flailing about ([\w'\-]+)\'s form recede\.

Trigger.name: Disturbed
Trigger.script: ak.disturbed = true ak.scoreup(target)

regexCodeList.string: Clouds boil into existence above you, their dark mass seething.

Trigger.name: Arcane Energy
Trigger.script: ak.ae = matches[2]+0 ak.scoreup(target)

regexCodeList.string: ^You have (\d+) units of arcane energy built up\.
^You have (\d+) units of arcane energy stored\.

Trigger.name: Disturb Gone
Trigger.script: ak.disturbed = false ak.ae = 0 ak.feedback = false ak.scoreup(target)

regexCodeList.string: The clouds overhead abruptly wink out of existence.
The weather here is not disturbed - you cannot redirect the feedback of your spells.

Trigger.name: Feedback
Trigger.script: ak.feedback = matches[2] ak.ae = 0 ak.scoreup(matches[2])

regexCodeList.string: ^Directing a sliver of power through your air and earth channels, you create a conduit between the clouds above and ([\w'\-]+)\.

Trigger.name: Hellsight
Trigger.script: local aff = "hellsight" if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then OppGainedAff(aff) end

regexCodeList.string: ^You stare intently at ([\w'\-]+), opening [\w'\-]+ mind to the unspeakable visions that spew from the bowels of hell\.$
^(w+) claws at {his|her} eyes, fingers scrabbling frantically.$

Trigger.name: Dazzle
Trigger.script: --confusion --dizziness local aff = "confusion" local aff2 = "dizziness" if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then OppGainedAff(aff) OppGainedAff(aff2) end

regexCodeList.string: ^You direct a dazzling ray of divine light at ([\w'\-]+)\.$

Trigger.name: Aeon
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then aeonreset = false OppGainedAff("aeon") AeonTimer = tempTimer(15,[[aeonreset = true]]) end

regexCodeList.string: ^Standing the Aeon on your open palm\, you blow it lightly at ([\w'\-]+) and watch as it seems to slow [\w'\-]+ movement through the time stream\.

Trigger.name: Aeon Speed
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then ak.defs.speed = false ak.scoreup(matches[2]) end

regexCodeList.string: ^You stand an Aeon tarot on your palm\, and blow it lightly at ([\w'\-]+)\.$

Trigger.name: Moon
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end if IsTargetted(matches[2]) and nextmoon and nextmoon ~= "DOPPLEGANGER" then OppGainedAff(nextmoon) else ak.occie.aura.mental = ak.occie.aura.mental + 1 end

regexCodeList.string: ^As you fling the Moon tarot at ([\w'\-]+)\, it turns an ominous\, sickly red\, before striking (her|him) in the head\.$

Trigger.name: Hierophant
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then OppGainedAff("hierophant") if ak.timers.Hiero then killTimer(ak.timers.Hiero) end ak.timers.Hiero = tempTimer(60,[[ if affstrack.score.hierophant > 0 then OppLostAff("hierophant") end killTimer(ak.timers.Hiero) ]]) end

regexCodeList.string: ^You quickly fling a Hierophant tarot card at ([\w'\-]+)\.$

Trigger.name: Hierophant Used
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then OppLostAff("hierophant") end

regexCodeList.string: ^By the power of the Hierophant\, you command ([\w'\-]+)\.$
^You issue the command\, but ([\w'\-]+) just ignores you\.$

Trigger.name: Justice
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end if IsTargetted(multimatches[2][2]) then OppGainedAff("justice") end

regexCodeList.string: With a prayer to Miramar, the Just, you fling your tarot card at
^With a prayer to Miramar\, the Just\, you fling your tarot card at ([\w'\-]+)\. A set of scales appears above [\w'\-]+ head and one side of the scale quickly descends\. Justice will be done\.$

Trigger.name: Lovers
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then OppGainedAff("lovers") end

regexCodeList.string: ^You throw a Lovers tarot at ([\w'\-]+) and as it strikes true\, a look of utter love covers [\w'\-]+ face\.$

Trigger.name: Hangedman
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then affstrack.score.bound = 100 ak.scoreup(matches[2]) --8secs end

regexCodeList.string: ^You toss the Hanged Man tarot card at ([\w'\-]+) and as it reaches [\w'\-]+\, a huge mass of rope bursts out of it to entrap and hinder [\w'\-]+\.$

Trigger.name: Perspire
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then OppGainedAff("slickness") end

regexCodeList.string: ^You force ([\w'\-]+) into a state of heightened perspiring\.$

Trigger.name: Roil Nausea
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then if affstrack.score.nausea > 0 then ak.thoughtIhad("nausea") end OppGainedAff("nausea") ak.fluxcheck = "roil" ak.fluxline = matches[1] enableTrigger("Flux Enhance") end

regexCodeList.string: ^You wave a hand casually in the direction of ([\w'\-]+)\, violently roiling the liquid within [\w'\-]+ stomach\.$

Trigger.name: Roil Unkown
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then ak.ProTrackingConfirmed("nausea") ak.fluxcheck = "roil" ak.fluxline = matches[1] enableTrigger("Flux Enhance") end

regexCodeList.string: ^You wave a hand in the direction of ([\w'\-]+) roiling the liquid that flows throughout [\w'\-]+ and disrupting [\w'\-]+ mental stability\.$

Trigger.name: Choke
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end if not IsTargetted(matches[2]) then return end if affstrack.score.asthma == 100 then OppGainedAff("hallucinations") else OppGainedAff("asthma") end ak.pervasion.hitcount = ak.pervasion.hitcount + 1 ak.fluxline = matches[1] ak.fluxcheck = "choke" enableTrigger("Flux Enhance")

regexCodeList.string: ^You manifest water inside the lungs of ([\w'\-]+)\, causing [\w'\-]+ to hack and cough violently\.$

Trigger.name: Drench Weariness
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then if affstrack.score.weariness > 0 then ak.thoughtIhad("weariness") end OppGainedAff("weariness") ak.fluxline = matches[1] ak.fluxcheck = "drench" enableTrigger("Flux Enhance") end

regexCodeList.string: ^You call down a deluge to drench the impudent ([\w'\-]+)\, soaking [\w'\-]+ with icy water\.$

Trigger.name: Drench Confusion
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then ak.ProTrackingConfirmed("weariness") OppGainedAff("confusion") end ak.fluxline = matches[1] ak.fluxcheck = "drench" enableTrigger("Flux Enhance")

regexCodeList.string: ^You call down a deluge to drench the impudent ([\w'\-]+)\, leaving [\w'\-]+ dazed and confused\.$

Trigger.name: Parch

Trigger.name: Thin
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then if affstrack.score.haemophilia > 0 then ak.thoughtIhad("haemophilia") end OppGainedAff("haemophilia") ak.pervasion.initialbleed = false end

regexCodeList.string: ^You exert your limited control of the blood that flows through the veins of ([\w'\-]+)\, thinning it\.$

Trigger.name: Applied
Trigger.script: if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then if gmcp and gmcp.Char and gmcp.Char.Vitals and gmcp.Char.Vitals.charstats[3] and gmcp.Char.Vitals.charstats[3] == "Spec: Two Handed" then send("battlefury perceive "..target) end --if ak.twoh[ak.twoh.salveconversion[matches[3]]] > 5 then --ak.twoh[ak.twoh.salveconversion[matches[3]]] = ak.twoh[ak.twoh.salveconversion[matches[3]]] - 2 --cecho("<yellow>"..ak.twoh.salveconversion[matches[3]]..":<cyan> "..ak.twoh[ak.twoh.salveconversion[matches[3]]]) --else ak.twoh[ak.twoh.salveconversion[matches[3]]] = ak.twoh[ak.twoh.salveconversion[matches[3]]] - 1 if ak.twoh[ak.twoh.salveconversion[matches[3]]] < 0 then ak.twoh[ak.twoh.salveconversion[matches[3]]] = 0 end cecho("<yellow>"..ak.twoh.salveconversion[matches[3]]..":<cyan> "..ak.twoh[ak.twoh.salveconversion[matches[3]]]) --end if matches[3] == "legs" then ak.tendonHit() elseif matches[3] == "arms" then ak.wristHit() elseif matches[3] == "head" then ak.skullHit() elseif matches[3] == "torso" then ak.ribHit() end ak.scoreup(matches[2]) end --legs,arms,head,torso

Trigger.name: Sent Queue
Trigger.script: local combodraw = multimatches[2][2] if not string.findPattern(combodraw,"hfp") and not string.findPattern(combodraw,"snk") and not string.findPattern(combodraw,"spp") and not string.findPattern(combodraw,"mnk") and not string.findPattern(combodraw,"drawslash") then return end combodraw = string.gsub(combodraw, "/", " ") combodraw = combodraw:split(" ") ak.limbs.parriedlimbs = {} for i = 1, #combodraw do if string.findPattern(combodraw[i],"hfp") then table.insert(ak.limbs.parriedlimbs,combodraw[i+1]:lower().."leg") elseif string.findPattern(combodraw[i],"snk") then table.insert(ak.limbs.parriedlimbs,combodraw[i+1]:lower().."leg") elseif string.findPattern(combodraw[i],"spp") then table.insert(ak.limbs.parriedlimbs,combodraw[i+1]:lower().."arm") elseif string.findPattern(combodraw[i],"mnk") then table.insert(ak.limbs.parriedlimbs,combodraw[i+1]:lower().."arm") elseif string.findPattern(combodraw[i],"drawslash") then table.insert(ak.limbs.parriedlimbs,combodraw[i+2]:lower().."arm") end end

Trigger.script: ak.limbs.blademaster.stance.Me = "Thyr" ak.scoreup(target)

regexCodeList.string: Readying yourself with a flourish, you flow into the Thyr stance.

Trigger.name: Mir
Trigger.script: ak.limbs.blademaster.stance.Me = "Mir" ak.scoreup(target)

regexCodeList.string: Resolving to move as water, you enter the Mir stance.

Trigger.name: Doya
Trigger.script: ak.limbs.blademaster.stance.Me = "Doya" ak.scoreup(target)

regexCodeList.string: Lowering your centre of gravity, you drop into the Doya stance.

Trigger.name: Sanya
Trigger.script: ak.limbs.blademaster.stance.Me = "Sanya" ak.scoreup(target)

regexCodeList.string: Clearing your mind, you sink into the Sanya stance.

Trigger.name: Unstanced
Trigger.script: ak.limbs.blademaster.stance["Me"] = "None" ak.scoreup(target)

regexCodeList.string: You adopt a neutral stance.

Trigger.name: Drawslash
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end local limb = ak.limbs.standardizeLimb(multimatches[2][3]) table.insert(ak.limbs.currentbreak.weapon,"drawslash") table.insert(ak.limbs.currentbreak.limb,limb) table.insert(ak.limbs.currentbreak.attacker,"Me") table.insert(ak.limbs.currentbreak.who,target) table.insert(ak.limbs.currentbreak.augment,"blademaster") enableTrigger("Missed Single Removal Limbs") enableTrigger("Confirmed Hit Limbs") enableTrigger("Parry locate")

Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end local weapon = matches[4] local limb = ak.limbs.standardizeLimb(matches[2]) table.insert(ak.limbs.currentbreak.weapon,weapon) table.insert(ak.limbs.currentbreak.limb,limb) table.insert(ak.limbs.currentbreak.attacker,"Me") table.insert(ak.limbs.currentbreak.who,matches[3]) table.insert(ak.limbs.currentbreak.augment,"sentinel") enableTrigger("Missed Single Removal Limbs") enableTrigger("Confirmed Hit Limbs") enableTrigger("Parry locate")

regexCodeList.string: ^You savagely gouge the (right leg|left leg|right arm|left arm|head|torso) of ([\w'\-]+) with (.*)\.$

Trigger.name: Doublestrike
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end local weapon = matches[2] local limb = ak.limbs.standardizeLimb(matches[3]) table.insert(ak.limbs.currentbreak.weapon,weapon) table.insert(ak.limbs.currentbreak.limb,limb) table.insert(ak.limbs.currentbreak.attacker,"Me") table.insert(ak.limbs.currentbreak.who,matches[4]) table.insert(ak.limbs.currentbreak.augment,"sentinel") enableTrigger("Missed Single Removal Limbs") enableTrigger("Confirmed Hit Limbs") enableTrigger("Parry locate")

regexCodeList.string: ^You draw the blade of (.*) in an expert lateral slice across the (right leg|left leg|right arm|left arm|head|torso) of ([\w'\-]+)\.$

Trigger.name: Slice
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end local augment = "none" local weapon = matches[3] local limb = ak.limbs.standardizeLimb(matches[2]) table.insert(ak.limbs.currentbreak.weapon,weapon) table.insert(ak.limbs.currentbreak.limb,limb) table.insert(ak.limbs.currentbreak.attacker,"Me") table.insert(ak.limbs.currentbreak.who,target) table.insert(ak.limbs.currentbreak.augment,"slice") enableTrigger("Missed Single Removal Limbs") enableTrigger("Confirmed Hit Limbs") enableTrigger("Parry locate")

regexCodeList.string: ^You slice into the (right leg|left leg|right arm|left arm|head|torso) of [\w'\-]+ with (.*)\.$

Trigger.name: Smite
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end local weapon = matches[4] local limb = ak.limbs.standardizeLimb(matches[3]) table.insert(ak.limbs.currentbreak.weapon,weapon) table.insert(ak.limbs.currentbreak.limb,limb) table.insert(ak.limbs.currentbreak.attacker,"Me") table.insert(ak.limbs.currentbreak.who,matches[2]) table.insert(ak.limbs.currentbreak.augment,"smite") enableTrigger("Missed Single Removal Limbs") enableTrigger("Confirmed Hit Limbs") enableTrigger("Parry locate")

Trigger.name: Puppet Mangle
Trigger.script: if IsTargetted(matches[3]) then if ak.ai() then return end local limbt = ak.limbs.standardizeLimb(matches[2]) if affstrack.score[limbt] > 0 then affstrack.score[limbt] = 300 ak.vodunmangled = true tempTimer(5,[[ak.vodunmangled = false]]) else affstrack.score[limbt] = 200 end ak.scoreup(matches[3]) end

regexCodeList.string: The (right leg|left leg|right arm|left arm|head|torso) of ([\w'\-]+) is suddenly horribly mangled by an unseen force\.$

Trigger.name: Staff Strike
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end ak.defs.shield = false if matches[2] == "Sllshya" then table.insert(ak.limbs.currentbreak.weapon, "waterstaff") elseif matches[2] == "Garash" then table.insert(ak.limbs.currentbreak.weapon, "earthstaff") elseif matches[2] == "Kkractle" then table.insert(ak.limbs.currentbreak.weapon, "firestaff") elseif matches[2] == "Whiirh" then table.insert(ak.limbs.currentbreak.weapon, "airstaff") end local limb = ak.limbs.standardizeLimb(matches[4]) table.insert(ak.limbs.currentbreak.limb, limb) table.insert(ak.limbs.currentbreak.attacker,"Me") table.insert(ak.limbs.currentbreak.who,matches[3]) enableTrigger("Missed Single Removal Limbs") enableTrigger("Parry locate") enableTrigger("Confirmed Hit Limbs")

Trigger.name: Bop OFF
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return else return end local weapon = matches[4] local limb = ak.limbs.standardizeLimb(matches[3]) table.insert(ak.limbs.currentbreak.weapon,weapon) table.insert(ak.limbs.currentbreak.limb,limb) table.insert(ak.limbs.currentbreak.attacker,"Me") table.insert(ak.limbs.currentbreak.who,matches[2]) table.insert(ak.limbs.currentbreak.augment,"sentinel") enableTrigger("Missed Single Removal Limbs") enableTrigger("Confirmed Hit Limbs") enableTrigger("Parry locate")

Trigger.name: Stupidty
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then if FocusCount() == 0 and affstrack.score.impatience == 100 then if ak.ProTrackingConfirmed then ak.ProTrackingConfirmed("stupidity") else affstrack.score.stupidity = 100 end affstrack.score.impatience = 0 ak.scoreup(matches[2]) elseif affstrack.score.impatience > 0 then if ak.ProTrackingConfirmed then ak.ProTrackingConfirmed("stupidity") else affstrack.score.stupidity = 100 ak.scoreup(matches[2]) end --affstrack.score.impatience = 100 --ak.scoreup(matches[2]) else if ak.ProTrackingConfirmed then ak.ProTrackingConfirmed("stupidity") else affstrack.score.stupidity = 100 ak.scoreup(matches[2]) end end end

if ak.ai() then return end if IsTargetted(matches[2]) and affstrack.score.impatience < 100 then OppGainedAff("impatience") if affstrack.score.hypochondria > 0 then
end end

<cyan>"..target.."'s <yellow>Right Leg <cyan>Count Is Off! Attempting To Correct!

") _G[target.."rightlegdisablelimbdamage"] = nil if ak.thoughtIhad then ak.thoughtIhad("rightleg") else affstrack.score.rightleg = 0 end end elseif applycure and applycure.possiblemendings and #applycure.possiblemendings == 1 and applycure.possiblemendings[1] == "rightleg" then AKcalculateSalve() if affstrack.score.leftleg >= 100 then ak.limbs.limbcount[target].leftleg = ak.limbs.limbcount[target].lastpercentleftleg cecho("

<cyan>"..target.."'s <yellow>Left Leg <cyan>Count Is Off! Attempting To Correct!

") _G[target.."leftlegdisablelimbdamage"] = nil if ak.thoughtIhad then ak.thoughtIhad("leftleg") else affstrack.score.leftleg = 0 end end else if ak.limbs.limbcount[target].maxbreaks.rightleg < ak.limbs.limbcount[target].maxbreaks.leftleg and affstrack.score.leftleg >= 100 and affstrack.score.rightleg >= 100 then ak.limbs.limbcount[target].leftleg = ak.limbs.limbcount[target].lastpercentleftleg cecho("

<cyan>"..target.."'s <yellow>Left Leg <cyan>Count Is Off! Attempting To Correct!

") _G[target.."leftlegdisablelimbdamage"] = nil if ak.thoughtIhad then ak.thoughtIhad("leftleg") else affstrack.score.leftleg = 0 end elseif ak.limbs.limbcount[target].maxbreaks.rightleg > ak.limbs.limbcount[target].maxbreaks.leftleg and affstrack.score.rightleg >= 100 and affstrack.score.leftleg >= 100 then ak.limbs.limbcount[target].rightleg = ak.limbs.limbcount[target].lastpercentrightleg cecho("

<cyan>"..target.."'s <yellow>Right Leg <cyan>Count Is Off! Attempting To Correct!

") _G[target.."rightlegdisablelimbdamage"] = nil if ak.thoughtIhad then ak.thoughtIhad("rightleg") else affstrack.score.rightleg = 0 end else if ak.limbs.FindLastBrokenLeg() == "leftleg" and affstrack.score.leftleg > 100 then ak.limbs.limbcount[target].leftleg = ak.limbs.limbcount[target].lastpercentleftleg cecho("

<cyan>"..target.."'s <yellow>Left Leg <cyan>Count Is Off! Attempting To Correct!

") _G[target.."leftlegdisablelimbdamage"] = nil if ak.thoughtIhad then ak.thoughtIhad("leftleg") else affstrack.score.leftleg = 0 end elseif affstrack.score.rightleg > 100 then ak.limbs.limbcount[target].rightleg = ak.limbs.limbcount[target].lastpercentrightleg cecho("

<cyan>"..target.."'s <yellow>Right Leg <cyan>Count Is Off! Attempting To Correct!

") _G[target.."rightlegdisablelimbdamage"] = nil if ak.thoughtIhad then ak.thoughtIhad("rightleg") else affstrack.score.rightleg = 0 end end end end --end affstrack.score.leftleg = 0 affstrack.score.rightleg = 0 ak.scoreup(matches[2]) --cecho("<cyan>

"..target.. " IS NO LONGER PRONE. HE|SHE IS UP!!

") --cecho("<cyan>"..target.. " IS NO LONGER PRONE. HE|SHE IS UP!!

") --cecho("<cyan>"..target.. " IS NO LONGER PRONE. HE|SHE IS UP!!

") --cecho("<cyan>"..target.. " IS NO LONGER PRONE. HE|SHE IS UP!!

") if ak.limbs.limbcount[matches[2]] then _G[target.."rightlegdisablelimbdamage"] = nil _G[target.."leftlegdisablelimbdamage"] = nil end end

Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then if ak.ProTrackingConfirmed then ak.ProTrackingConfirmed("dementia") else affstrack.score.dementia = 100 ak.scoreup(matches[2]) end end

regexCodeList.string: ^([\w'\-]+) stares about [\w'\-]+ frenziedly\, wild\-eyed\.$

Trigger.name: TimeLoop
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end if IsTargetted(multimatches[2][2]) then OppGainedAff("timeloop") end

regexCodeList.string: Grey fog begins to rise from the suddenly panicked-looking
^Grey fog begins to rise from the suddenly panicked\-looking ([\w'\-]+)\.$

Trigger.name: Parried Venom Decline
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end if IsTargetted(matches[2]) and ak.thoughtIhad then affstrack.score.prone = 0 affstrack.score.scalded = 0 ak.thoughtIhad("nausea") ak.thoughtIhad("paralysis") elseif IsTargetted(matches[2]) then affstrack.score.prone = 0 affstrack.score.scalded = 0 affstrack.score["nausea"] = 0 ak.scoreup(matches[2]) end

regexCodeList.string: ^([\w'\-]+) parries the attack with a deft manoeuvre.$

Trigger.name: Bcry
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then OppGainedAff("sensitivity") end

regexCodeList.string: ^([\w'\-]+) falls to [\w'\-]+ knees and clutches [\w'\-]+ ears as the shaft of sound strikes ([\w'\-]+)\.$

Trigger.name: Nairat
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then affstrack.score.bound = 100 ak.scoreup(matches[2]) end

regexCodeList.string: ^Ethereal bonds flash forth to bind ([\w'\-]+) as [\w'\-]+ gaze falls upon a nairat rune\.$

Trigger.name: Epilepsy
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then if ak.ProTrackingConfirmed then ak.ProTrackingConfirmed("epilepsy") else affstrack.score.epilepsy = 100 ak.scoreup(matches[2]) end end

regexCodeList.string: ^([\w'\-]+) begins to jerk and shake violently\, foaming at the mouth\.$

Trigger.name: Frozen Disrupt
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then affstrack.score.disrupt = 100 if affstrack.score.frozen < 100 then affstrack.score.frozen = 100 end ak.scoreup(matches[2]) end

regexCodeList.string: ^([\w'\-]+) shivers particularly intensely\.$

Trigger.name: Smash
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end ak.limbs.ParseonLine() if IsTargetted(matches[4]) then smashlimb = matches[2]..matches[3] if affstrack.score[smashlimb] < 100 then OppGainedAff(smashlimb) end end

regexCodeList.string: ^The crackle of snapping bone can be heard as a crystalline golem viciously twists the ([\w'\-]+) ([\w'\-]+) of ([\w'\-]+)\.$

Trigger.name: Timeflux Wear Off
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end ak.limbs.ParseonLine() if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then if fluxtimer then killTimer(fluxtimer) fluxtimer = nil end OppLostAff("timeflux") end

regexCodeList.string: ^([\w'\-]+) appears far less sluggish all of a sudden\.$

Trigger.name: Failed Hypothermia
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end ak.limbs.ParseonLine() if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then if affstrack.score.frozen > 200 then affstrack.score.frozen = 200 end end

regexCodeList.string: ^A crystalline golem blasts ([\w'\-]+) with an icy stream of water\, but it does little more than irritate [\w'\-]+\.$

Trigger.name: Scalded
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end ak.limbs.ParseonLine() if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then OppGainedAff("scalded") if ak.scaldTimer then killTimer(ak.scaldTimer) end ak.scaldTimer = tempTimer(17,[[ affstrack.score.scalded = 0 ak.scoreup(]]..matches[2]..[[) ]]) end

regexCodeList.string: ^Leaning down over the incapacitated form of ([\w'\-]+)\, a crystalline golem sprays a stream of super\-heated steam directly into [\w'\-]+ face\.$

Trigger.name: Hypothermia
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end ak.limbs.ParseonLine() if IsTargetted(multimatches[2][2]) then affstrack.score.frozen = 300 affstrack.score.hypothermia = 100 ak.scoreup(multimatches[2][2]) end --affstrack.score.frozen = (affstrack.score.frozen * 2)-100

regexCodeList.string: As a crystalline golem blasts
^As a crystalline golem blasts ([\w'\-]+) with icy water, [\w'\-]+ begins to shake and tremble uncontrollably\.$

Trigger.name: Dehydrate
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end ak.limbs.ParseonLine() if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then affstrack.score.prone = 100 if affstrack.score.aflame < 100 then affstrack.score.aflame = 100 end if dehydratetimer then killTimer(dehydratetimer) dehydratetimer = nil end OppGainedAff("dehydrate") dehydratetimer = tempTimer(45, [[OppLostAff("dehydrate")]]) end

regexCodeList.string: ^([\w'\-]+) winces in evident discomfort as a crystalline golem points a single appendage at [\w'\-]+\.$

Trigger.name: Conflagrate
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end ak.limbs.ParseonLine() if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then if affstrack.score.aflame < 200 then affstrack.score.aflame = 200 end OppGainedAff("conflagrate") end

regexCodeList.string: ^As a crystalline golem turns toward ([\w'\-]+), the flames crackling across
^The conflagration about ([\w'\-]+) continues to rage, searing flesh from bone\.$

Trigger.name: TimeFlux
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end ak.limbs.ParseonLine() if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then if fluxtimer then killTimer(fluxtimer);fluxtimer = nil end OppGainedAff("timeflux") fluxtimer = tempTimer(65, [[OppLostAff("timeflux")]]) end

regexCodeList.string: ^As a crystalline golem begins to pulse with a strange inner glow, ([\w'\-]+) sways unsteadily\.$

Trigger.name: Hiraku Anorexia
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end ak.limbs.ParseonLine() if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then local aff = "anorexia" ak.AddedAffReset(aff) ak.AddedAffReset("stuttering") affstrack.score[aff] = 100 affstrack.score["stuttering"] = 100 ak.echogain("anorexia, stuttering") ak.scoreup(matches[2]) end

regexCodeList.string: ^The staff smashes into the face of ([\w'\-]+) with a sickening crunch\.$

Trigger.name: Hiru Dizziness
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end ak.limbs.ParseonLine() if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then local aff = "dizziness" ak.AddedAffReset(aff) affstrack.score[aff] = 100 ak.echogain(aff:title()) ak.scoreup(matches[2]) end

regexCodeList.string: ^The staff connects to the side of ([\w'\-]+)\'s head with a resounding crack\.$

Trigger.name: Ruku clumsiness/healthleech
Trigger.script:
if ak.ai() then return end --ak.limbs.ParseonLine() if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then if ak.kata and ak.kata >= 9 then OppGainedAff("clumsiness, healthleech") elseif affstrack.score.clumsiness <100 then local aff = "clumsiness" ak.AddedAffReset(aff) affstrack.score[aff] = 100 ak.echogain(aff:title()) ak.scoreup(matches[2]) else local aff = "healthleech" ak.AddedAffReset(aff) affstrack.score[aff] = 100 ak.echogain(aff:title()) ak.scoreup(matches[2]) end end
--if kata > 8 ruku gives both

regexCodeList.string: ^You whip a .+ at ([\w'\-]+) in a controlled arc\, bringing its length to crack against [\w'\-]+ [\w'\-]+ arm\.$

Trigger.name: Needle crushedthroat

regexCodeList.string: ^The end of the staff smashes into the exposed throat of ([\w'\-]+)\, crushing cartilage\.$

Trigger.name: Flashheel Bonus Limb

regexCodeList.string: You feel the satisfying crunch of bone under the impact of your heel.

Trigger.name: Disloyalty
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end if IsTargetted(matches[4]) then affstrack.score.disloyalty = 100 ak.scoreup(matches[4]) end

regexCodeList.string: ^A howling wind sweeps over ([\w'\-]+)\, ripping flesh from bone and leaving [\w'\-]+ face a bloody ruin\.$

Trigger.name: Hamstring Lost
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then OppLostAff("hamstring") end

Trigger.name: Peace
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then OppLostAff("pacifism") end

^([\w'\-]+) points [\w'\-]+ finger at you\, but nothing seems to happen\.$

Trigger.name: Blindness
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then affstrack.score.blind = 100 tempTimer(6,[[affstrack.score.blind = 0;ak.scoreup(]]..matches[2]..[[)]]) end

regexCodeList.string: ^([\w'\-]+) blinks slowly\, and begins to tremble\.$

Trigger.name: Relapsed
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then if ak.ProTrackingConfirmed then ak.ProTrackingConfirmed("scytherus") else affstrack.score.scytherus = 100 ak.scoreup(matches[2]) end end

regexCodeList.string: ^([\w'\-]+) screams out in agony\, struck by the effects of a vicious venom\.$

Trigger.name: Not Asthmatic
Trigger.script: if ak.thoughtIhad and affstrack.score.asthma > 0 then ak.thoughtIhad("asthma") end

Trigger.name: Agith'tai
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then OppGainedAff(gmcp.Char.Afflictions.Add.name) end

Trigger.name: Paralysis
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end --ak.limbs.ParseonLine() if IsTargetted(matches[2]) and affstrack.score.paralysis < 100 then OppGainedAff("paralysis") end

regexCodeList.string: ^Horror overcomes ([\w'\-]+)'s face as ([\w'\-]+) body stiffens into paralysis\.$
^([\w'\-]+) stiffens suddenly\, (his|her|faes) features a masque frozen in agony\.$
^([\w'\-]+)'s body stiffens rapidly with paralysis\.$
^The body of ([\w'\-]+) locks in paralysis as [\w'\-]+ directs a short burst of arcane power in [\w'\-]+ direction\.$
^Lunging to the side\, [\w'\-]+ brings [\w'\-]+ shield around to smash into the spine of ([\w'\-]+)\.$
^[\w'\-]+ recites an epic tale of the heroism of Nicator to ([\w'\-]+)\.$
^Horror overcomes the face of ([\w'\-]+) as [\w'\-]+ body locks in paralysis\.$
^([\w'\-]+)\'s limbs suddenly lock up\.$

regexCodeList.string: ^[\w'\-]+ ducks low\, \w+ blade slicing into the ([\w'\-]+) ([\w'\-]+) of ([\w'\-]+)\.$

Trigger.name: Not Crushed Throat
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then if affstrack.score.crushedthroat>0 then if ak.thoughtIhad then ak.thoughtIhad("crushedthroat") else affstrack.score.crushedthroat = 0 end end end

regexCodeList.string: ^(\w+) is not sufficiently incapacitated for you to dispatch \w+\.$

Trigger.name: Hypersomnia
Trigger.script: if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then OppGainedAff("hypersomnia") end

regexCodeList.string: ^(\w+) suddenly appears tired all of a sudden\.$

Trigger.name: Contemplate
Trigger.script: ak.currentmana = matches[3] ak.maxmana = matches[4] local currMana = math.ceil((matches[3]/matches[4])*100) cecho("\n<white>[<blue>Mana<white>]: <yellow>"..currMana.."%") if not ak.pause then send("pt "..matches[2].."'s mana at "..ak.currentmana.."/"..ak.maxmana) end if (currMana <= 40) then cecho("\n READY TO GO!!") end

Trigger.name: Moss
Trigger.script: if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then ak.currentmana = ak.currentmana + (ak.maxmana*.08) if ak.currentmana > tonumber(ak.maxmana) then ak.currentmana = ak.maxmana end ak.scoreup(target) end

regexCodeList.string: ^(\w+) eats some irid moss\.$
^(\w+) eats a potash crystal\.$

Trigger.name: Sip
Trigger.script: if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then if affstrack.score.anorexia>0 then if ak.thoughtIhad then ak.thoughtIhad("anorexia") else affstrack.score.anorexia = 0 end end if affstrack.score.voyria > 0 then affstrack.score.voyria = 0 elseif (not ak.defs.speed) then if not SpeedTimer then SpeedTimer = tempTimer(4.5,[[ ak.defs.speed = true SpeedTimer = false ak.scoreup(]]..matches[2]..[[) ]]) end else --ak.currentmana --ak.maxmana end ak.scoreup(matches[2]) end

regexCodeList.string: ^([\w'\-]+) takes a drink from .* vial\.$
^([\w'\-]+) takes a drink from a carved bone vial\, a miniature carved dragon biting at [\w'\-]+ lips\.$

Trigger.name: Enervate
Trigger.script: if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then ak.currentmana = ak.currentmana - (ak.maxmana/4) ak.scoreup(matches[2]) end

regexCodeList.string: ^[\w'\-]+ frowns in concentration as a tendril of yellow energy flashes out and attaches to ([\w'\-]+)\.$

Trigger.name: Divine

regexCodeList.string: ^([\w'\-]+) possesses \d+ health of (\d+)\, \d+ mana of \d+\, and \d+ willpower\.$

Trigger.name: Assess
Trigger.script: ak.knownmaxhealth = ak.knownmaxhealth or {} ak.knownmaxhealth[multimatches[2][2]] = multimatches[2][4] ak.currenthealth = multimatches[2][3] ak.maxhealth = multimatches[2][4] local currHealth = math.ceil((multimatches[2][3]/multimatches[2][4])*100) ak.healthpercent = currHealth cecho("\n<white>[<blue>Health<white>]: <yellow>"..currHealth.."%") if not ak.pause then send("pt "..multimatches[2][2].."'s health at "..ak.currenthealth.."/"..ak.maxhealth) end ak.scoreup(multimatches[2][2])

regexCodeList.string: You glance over
^You glance over ([\w'\-]+) and see that (?:her|his|faes) health is at (\d+)\/(\d+)\.$

Trigger.name: Gauge
Trigger.script: ak.knownmaxhealth = ak.knownmaxhealth or {} ak.knownmaxhealth[matches[2]] = matches[4] ak.currenthealth = matches[3] ak.maxhealth = matches[4] local currHealth = math.ceil((matches[3]/matches[4])*100) ak.healthpercent = currHealth ak.scoreup(matches[2])

regexCodeList.string: ^Gazing upon ([\w'\-]+), you establish that (?:he|she|fae) has (\d+) health remaining of (\d+)\.$

Trigger.name: Falcon Observe

regexCodeList.string: Your falcon reports seeing the following people in its area:

Trigger.name: Add
Trigger.script: ak.knownmaxhealth = ak.knownmaxhealth or {} ak.knownmaxhealth[matches[2]] = matches[4] falcon = falcon or {} falcon.areawho = falcon.areawho or {} if gmcp.Char.Name.name ~= matches[2] then table.insert(falcon.areawho,matches[2]) end if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then falcon.targetin = true else --ak.deleteFull() end

regexCodeList.string: ^([\w'\-]+)\s+(\d+) health out of (\d+)\.

Trigger.name: Falcon Observe Kill
Trigger.script: if not falcon.targetin then ak.deleteFull() end disableTrigger("Falcon Observe Capture") if ndba and #falcon.areawho > 0 then --cecho("<cyan>"..ndba.concatand(falcon.areawho).." are in " .. gmcp.Room.Info.area) send("pt "..ndba.concatand(falcon.areawho).." are in " .. gmcp.Room.Info.area) end

Trigger.name: Doll Check
Trigger.script: if IsTargetted(multimatches[2][2]) then ak.currentmana = ak.currentmana - (ak.maxmana/4) ak.knownmaxhealth = ak.knownmaxhealth or {} ak.knownmaxhealth[matches[2]] = matches[3] ak.scoreup(multimatches[2][2]) end

regexCodeList.string: You gaze into the eyes of the doll and see that
^You gaze into the eyes of the doll and see that ([\w'\-]+) has a health of (\d+)\/(\d+) and a mana of(\d+)\/(\d+)\.$
^([\w'\-]+) gasps a panicked breath before doubling over in pain\.$
^([\w'\-]+) expertly breaks the seal of a reforming phial of enhancement formula and brings it to [\w'\-]+ mouth\.$

Trigger.name: No Bleed
Trigger.script: if ak.bleeding and ak.bleeding > 0 and affstrack.score.haemophilia > 0 then ak.thoughtIhad("haemophilia") end ak.bleeding = 0 ak.scoreup(matches[2])

regexCodeList.string: ^You observe that ([\w'\-]+) is not bleeding at all\.$
^([\w'\-]+) does not yet bleed enough for you to unleash the coagulation\.$

Trigger.name: Bleed 0-100
Trigger.script: ak.bleedupdate(40) ak.scoreup(matches[2])

Trigger.script:
ak.bleedupdate(100) cecho("<red>

Bleeding for over 100!

") ak.scoreup(matches[2])

") ak.scoreup(matches[2])

Bleeding for over 900!

") ak.scoreup(matches[2])

ak.bleedupdate(1000) cecho("<red>

Bleeding for over 1000!

") ak.scoreup(matches[2])

regexCodeList.string: ^You observe that ([\w'\-]+) will shortly bleed to death\.$

Trigger.name: Curse Bleeded
Trigger.script: if IsTargetted(matches[2]) and affstrack.score.haemophilia > 0 then local bleedr = ak.bleedincrease or 65 ak.bleeding = ak.bleeding + bleedr cecho(ak.bleeding) ak.scoreup(matches[2]) end

regexCodeList.string: ^Blood begins to run from the eyes and nose of ([\w'\-]+)\.$

Trigger.name: Bleed Destroyed
Trigger.script: ak.bleeding = 0 ak.scoreup(matches[2])

regexCodeList.string: ^([\w'\-]+) writhes in agony as steam begins rising from [\w'\-]+ skin\.$

Trigger.name: Applied
Trigger.script:
if ak.ai() then return end
if ak.limbs.shikudoParse then ak.limbs.shikudoParse() end
if not IsTargetted(matches[2]) then return end if matches[3] == "skin" and not ak.defs.mass then ak.defs.mass = true ak.bals.salve = true cecho("<cyan>Mass Consideration Removed") elseif ak.bals.salve then if affstrack.score.aeon == 100 and affstrack.score.slickness == 100 then return else affstrack.score.tempslickness= 0 ak.bals.salve = false if affstrack.score.slickness>0 then if ak.thoughtIhad then ak.thoughtIhad("slickness") else affstrack.score.slickness = 0 end end ak.cure.apply(matches[3]) if ak.timers.apply then killTimer(ak.timers.apply) end ak.timers.apply = tempTimer(.8,[[ak.bals.salve = true;ak.timers.apply = false]]) --cecho("<cyan>Processed Cures") end else if ak.timers.apply then ak.bals.salve = true cecho("<cyan>Ignored Cures") end end

regexCodeList.string: ^([\w'\-]+) takes some (?:balm|salve) from a vial and rubs it on (?:her|his|faes) ([\w'\-]+).$

Trigger.name: Focused
Trigger.script:
if ak.ai() then return end if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then if ak.bals.focus then affstrack.score.rixil = 0 ak.bals.focus = false ak.timers.focus = tempTimer(2.2,[[ak.bals.focus = true;ak.timers.focus = nil]])--2.2 ak.cure.focus(matches[2]) end ak.currentmana = ak.currentmana - 250 affstrack.score.rixil = 0 if not ak.timers.focus then if not ak.bals.focus then ak.bals.focus = true cecho("<cyan>Ignored Cures") if ak.thoughtIhad then ak.thoughtIhad("impatience") else affstrack.score.impatience = 0 end end end if affstrack.score.impatience>0 then if ak.thoughtIhad then ak.thoughtIhad("impatience") else affstrack.score.impatience = 0 end cecho("

<yellow>IMPATIENCE CURED!!") cecho("

<yellow>IMPATIENCE CURED!!") cecho("

<yellow>IMPATIENCE CURED!!") end end

regexCodeList.string: ^A look of extreme focus crosses the face of ([\w'\-]+).$

Trigger.name: Opponent Ate
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end local donotrun = { "azurite mote", "gypsum crystal", "echinacea root", "bisemutum chip", "kola nut", "black cohosh root", "skullcap flower", "dolomite grain", "irid moss", "potash crystal", "quartz grain", "ball of myrrh gum", "antimony flake", "ginger root", } if table.contains(donotrun, matches[3]) then setTriggerStayOpen("Opponent Ate", 0) return elseif not IsTargetted(matches[2]) then setTriggerStayOpen("Opponent Ate", 0) return else ak.currenteat = matches[3] end
