Trigger.name: Serverside Alias Setting
Trigger.script:
if matches[2] == "dor" then return end affstrack.overcharge = false
local cursedraw = matches[3]:lower() cursedraw = string.gsub(cursedraw, "/", " ")
cursedraw = cursedraw:split(" ") for k,v in pairs(cursedraw) do if string.findPattern(cursedraw[k],"overcharge") then affstrack.overcharge = true elseif string.findPattern(cursedraw[k],"relapse") then invoked = cursedraw[k+1] elseif string.findPattern(cursedraw[k],"invoke") then invoked = cursedraw[k+2] elseif string.findPattern(cursedraw[k],"impurity") then nextcurse = cursedraw[k+1] elseif string.findPattern(cursedraw[k],"instill") then nextinstill = cursedraw[k+3] elseif string.findPattern(cursedraw[k],"moon") then nextmoon = cursedraw[k+3] elseif string.findPattern(cursedraw[k],"deadeyes") then nextcurse = cursedraw[k+2] nextcurse2 = cursedraw[k+3] elseif string.findPattern(cursedraw[k],"imbibe") then imbibedraw = cursedraw[k+1] elseif string.findPattern(cursedraw[k],"truewrack") then alchemisttruewrack = cursedraw[k+2] alchemisttruewracktwo = cursedraw[k+3] elseif string.findPattern(cursedraw[k],"wrack") then alchemistwrack = cursedraw[k+2] end end if table.contains(cursedraw,"combo") and ak.MonkType() ~= "Tekura" then ak.shikudo.AliasSplit(cursedraw) end

regexCodeList.string: Alias \"([\w'\-]+)\" will now execute\: \"(.*)\"

Trigger.name: Ran Off SS Split
Trigger.script:
if matches[2] == "OATTACK" then ak.queue.eqbal = {} ak.queue.sent = {} return end
local cursedraw = matches[2]:lower() cursedraw = string.gsub(cursedraw, "|", " ")
cursedraw = cursedraw:split(" ") for k,v in pairs(cursedraw) do if string.findPattern(cursedraw[k],"overcharge") then affstrack.overcharge = true elseif string.findPattern(cursedraw[k],"relapse") then invoked = cursedraw[k+1] elseif string.findPattern(cursedraw[k],"invoke") then invoked = cursedraw[k+2] elseif string.findPattern(cursedraw[k],"impurity") then nextcurse = cursedraw[k+1] elseif string.findPattern(cursedraw[k],"instill") then nextinstill = cursedraw[k+3] elseif string.findPattern(cursedraw[k],"moon") then nextmoon = cursedraw[k+3] elseif string.findPattern(cursedraw[k],"deadeyes") then nextcurse = cursedraw[k+2] nextcurse2 = cursedraw[k+3] elseif string.findPattern(cursedraw[k],"imbibe") then imbibedraw = cursedraw[k+1] elseif string.findPattern(cursedraw[k],"truewrack") then alchemisttruewrack = cursedraw[k+2] alchemisttruewracktwo = cursedraw[k+3] elseif string.findPattern(cursedraw[k],"wrack") then alchemistwrack = cursedraw[k+2] end end if table.contains(cursedraw,"combo") and ak.MonkType() ~= "Tekura" then ak.shikudo.AliasSplit(cursedraw) end

Trigger.name: Traits Parse
Trigger.script: ak.deleteFull() if matches[3] then --display(matches[3]) if matches[3] == "Quick-witted " then ak.balancemodifier = "quickwitted" elseif string.find(matches[3],"Nimble") then ak.balancemodifier = "nimble" elseif string.find(matches[3],"Expert Diagnoser") then --ak.expertdiagnose = true elseif string.find(matches[3],"Mind Warden") then ak.contemplator = true elseif string.find(matches[3],"Health Inspector") then ak.healthinspector = true end end

Trigger.name: Trait Ending
Trigger.script: ak.deleteFull() disableTrigger("Trait Gag Out")

regexCodeList.string: Key: Major Trait Minor Trait

Trigger.name: Class Changed(gmcp)
Trigger.script: ak.classenable() if wsys then monkenemy = {} if gmcp.Char.Status.class ~= "Monk" or gmcp.Char.Status.race:match("Dragon") then wsys.monkstance = false end if ndba and gmcp.Char.Status.class ~= "Monk" then enemylist = enemylist or {} if #enemylist > 0 then for i = 1, #enemylist do if ndba.isashtani(enemylist[i]) then send("unenemy "..enemylist[i]) table.insert(monkenemy, enemylist[i]) end end end end end enableTrigger("Trait Gag Out") send("trait list known") disableTrigger("Class Changed(gmcp)") enableTrigger("Class Changed Prompt Lock")

Trigger.name: Class Changed Prompt Lock
Trigger.script: enableTrigger("Class Changed(gmcp)") disableTrigger("Class Changed Prompt Lock")

TriggerGroup.name: Dragon Classlock Correction
TriggerGroup.script: if ak.ai() then return end if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then ak.dragonfied() end --Blasts Not Added --Strip Not Added --Summons have Red,Black,Silver

regexCodeList.string: ^([\w'\-]+) lets out a great keening\, casting the impurities from (?:her|his) form\.$
^([\w'\-]+)\'s eyes begin to blaze dangerously\.$
^([\w'\-]+) completes [\w'\-]+ transformation and\, with an ear\-splitting roar\, throws back [\w'\-]+ draconic head and screams out [\w'\-]+ triumph\.$
^([\w'\-]+) growls almost inaudibly\.$

^With a low rumbling from deep within [\w'\-]+ belly\, ([\w'\-]+) utters a guttural chant\. [\w'\-]+ skin ripples as a web of crackling magical energy dances like fire across its surface\, settling to solidify into a flexible\, translucent shell\.$
^([\w'\-]+) lunges at ([\w'\-]+) with long\, flashing ([\w'\-]+) extended\, tearing into (his|her) (right leg|left leg|right arm|left arm|head|torso) ruthlessly\.$
^([\w'\-]+) lunges forward with long\, flashing ([\w'\-]+) extended\, tearing down to the bones of your (right leg|left leg|right arm|left arm|head|torso)\.$
^Gritting [\w'\-]+ glistening teeth into a rictus grin\, ([\w'\-]+) emits a low rumble as [\w'\-]+ flexes [\w'\-]+ rippling muscles\.$
^([\w'\-]+) turns to fix [\w'\-]+ gaze upon you\, and you feel your heart increase its palpitations as a low keening echoes from [\w'\-]+ throat\.$
^Drawing an enormous breath\, ([\w'\-]+) exhales\, expelling a gale of wind with such force that you are knocked over\.$
^([\w'\-]+) fixes [\w'\-]+ gaze upon [\w'\-]+\, swaying slowly as [\w'\-]+ begins a low keening\.$
^Drawing an enormous breath\, ([\w'\-]+) exhales\, expelling a gale of wind with such force that [\w'\-]+ is knocked over\.$
^([\w'\-]+) crushes [\w'\-]+ between [\w'\-]+ massive jaws\, jerking [\w'\-]+ back and forth like a rag doll\.$
^([\w'\-]+) snaps [\w'\-]+ massive jaws close around you\, jerking you back and forth with agonising strength\.$
^([\w'\-]+)'s powerful chest expands as [\w'\-]+ takes a mighty breath\, loosing a shrill volley of [\w'\-]+\-infused vapour into the air\.$
^An ominous feeling descends upon you as ([\w'\-]+) turns [\w'\-]+ gaze upon you\.$

^([\w'\-]+)\'s nostrils flare wildly with a great rush of air as [\w'\-]+ sinuous body contracts and [\w'\-]+ mouth opens wide to emit a rippling\, unbroken roar that reverberates through your body and blasts your eardrums into oblivion\.$
^([\w'\-]+) draws himself up to [\w'\-]+ full height\, staring imperiously down at [\w'\-]+\.$
^([\w'\-]+)\'s nostrils flare wildly with a great rush of air as [\w'\-]+ sinuous body contracts and [\w'\-]+ mouth opens wide to emit a rippling\, unbroken roar at ([\w'\-]+)\.$
^([\w'\-]+) rips into [\w'\-]+ with [\w'\-]+ massive\, deadly claws\.$
^Lunging forward with long\, flashing claws extended\, ([\w'\-]+) tears into [\w'\-]+ ruthlessly\.$
^A deathly calm descends upon your surroundings as ([\w'\-]+) draws himself up regally\, eyes gleaming with murderous intent\.$

^([\w'\-]+) rises back on [\w'\-]+ hind legs\, more than doubling in height as [\w'\-]+ towers above you\. The groundshakes violently as [\w'\-]+ slams [\w'\-]+ feet back down\, recklessly crushing everyone in [\w'\-]+ path\.$
^([\w'\-]+)\'s tail narrowly misses you as it whips in a circle\.$
^You are knocked forcefully off your feet by the impact of ([\w'\-]+)\'s huge tail\.$
^[\w'\-]+ is knocked forcefully off [\w'\-]+ feet by the impact of ([\w'\-]+)\'s huge tail\.$
^Your body trembles as ([\w'\-]+) invokes a dramatic chant in the dragon tongue\. As [\w'\-]+ voice resonates\, you are assailed by a wave of magical energy that threatens to tear your skin apart\.$

^A resonant vibration emanates from ([\w'\-]+) as [\w'\-]+ invokes a rumbling\, sonorous chant in the dragon tongue\. As the sound increases\, ([\w'\-]+) jerks violently\, [\w'\-]+ body wracked by an unseen force\.$
^[\w'\-]+\'s form seems suddenly weighted down as ([\w'\-]+) lays the ancient Dragoncurse upon [\w'\-]+\.$
^A heavy burden descends upon your soul as ([\w'\-]+) lays the ancient Dragoncurse upon you\.$
^([\w'\-]+) whips [\w'\-]+ tail around\, striking the wall to the [\w'\-]+ with a powerful blow\. A network of fine fractures spreads over its surface before it suddenly collapses\.$
^([\w'\-]+) whips [\w'\-]+ tail around\, spinning in a wild circle\, in what you can only assume to be some draconic mating ritual\.$
^([\w'\-]+)\'s great form shudders briefly\.$
^([\w'\-]+) flicks [\w'\-]+ tail at you\, effortlessly shattering your magical shield\.$
^([\w'\-]+) dismissively flicks [\w'\-]+ tail at [\w'\-]+\, annihilating the magical shield surrounding [\w'\-]+ with casual ease\.$

Trigger.name: Earth Lord
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then ak.elementalfied("Earth") end

regexCodeList.string: ^The magma\-wreathed form of ([\w'\-]+) smashes into you\, crushing you beneath [\w'\-]+ massive bulk and searing you to the bone\.$
^With a terrible roar ([\w'\-]+) whips a colossal fist at your .*\.$
^You feel bones grinding against one another as the fist of ([\w'\-]+) smashes into your .* with pulverising force\.$
^Magma erupts from the cracks between the plates covering ([\w'\-]+)\, cloaking [\w'\-]+ in a churning shroud of molten stone\.$
^The stone fist of ([\w'\-]+) crunches into your .*\.$
^The rock plates covering the form of ([\w'\-]+) rapidly thicken\, sharp spires of stone rapidly sprouting from them\.$
^Cloaked in a shifting mantle of molten stone\, ([\w'\-]+) charges in from the .* with a deafening roar\.$
^Magma ceases to bubble up from beneath the outer strata of ([\w'\-]+)\.$

Trigger.name: Fire Lord
Trigger.script: if ak.ai() then return end if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then ak.elementalfied("Fire") end

regexCodeList.string: ^The fiery outer layers of ([\w'\-]+) fall away\, turning to dust as they drift to the ground\. Though ([\w'\-]+)seems diminished for an instant\, [\w'\-]+ fires soon rage with fury once more\.$

Trigger.name: Hypnotised
Trigger.script: mesmer.status = "hypnotised" mesmer.startTimer() deleteLine() boxDisplay("HYPNOTIZED - BEGIN SUGGESTING!", "black:white")

regexCodeList.string: ^You fix (\w+) with an entrancing stare\, and smile in satisfaction as you realise that \w+ mind is yours\.$

Trigger.name: Prepare
Trigger.script: mesmer.status = "in progress" deleteLine() boxDisplay("STARTING HYPNOSIS", "black:white")

regexCodeList.string: ^You prepare yourself to hypnotise your victim\, (\w+)\.$

Trigger.name: Sealed
Trigger.script: mesmer.status = "sealed" mesmer.stopTimer() deleteLine() boxDisplay("SEALED @ " .. mesmer.sealTime .. "s", "black:white", true)

regexCodeList.string: ^You draw (\w+) out of (his|her|faes) hypnotic daze\, your suggestions indelibly printed on \w+ mind\.$

Trigger.name: Suggestion
Trigger.script: deleteLine() mesmer.push()

regexCodeList.string: ^You issue the suggestion\, concealing it deep within (\w+)\'s mind\.$

Trigger.name: Lost Control
Trigger.script: mesmer.resetTarget()

regexCodeList.string: ^You feel your control over (\w+)\'s mind fade\.$

Trigger.name: Noticed
Trigger.script: mesmer.resetTarget()

regexCodeList.string: ^(\w+) has noticed your attempt at hypnosis\!$

Trigger.name: Perceptive/Failed
Trigger.script: mesmer.resetTarget()

regexCodeList.string: ^(\w+) is too perceptive for your hypnotic skill\. You hurriedly cease your attempts before being noticed\.$
Your attempt at hypnosis has failed.

Trigger.name: Clear
Trigger.script: mesmer.resetTarget()

regexCodeList.string: ^(\w+) is not under your hypnotic spell\.$

Trigger.name: Snap
Trigger.script: --mesmer.status = "snapped" if mesmer.status == "sealed" then mesmer.status = "snapped" end

regexCodeList.string: ^You snap your fingers in front of (\w+)\.$
